replies.body: it's cause you have 10 games as him you dumba**s**s. that will happen any time you have 10 games as any champ. because it's a fu**c**king average.

It's an average so each stat (K/D/A) is being dividing by your number of games, aka 10.
Literally play any champion 10 times with any KDA other than 0/0/0 and this will happen.
